description:
Mutou Aoi once held the title of Miss Agricultural University, but after returning on foot from a long trip with a bag full of fermented foods on her back, she`s lost much of her feminine appeal. She`s ready to take it easy now that she`s back in Japan, but Sawaki spots a microbe on her that turns out to be one of Asia`s top 5 causes of food poisoning!
Source: crunchyroll
